CustomField.description: Scope of API access, e.g. "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar" provides read-write access to Calendars, Calendar Events and Calendar ACLs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Scope of API access, e.g. "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar" provides read-write access to Calendars, Calendar Events and Calendar ACLs
CustomField.label: Scope
